actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to protect more fully certain constitutional rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides that no citizen shall be extra-judicially penalized except pursuant to an Act of Congress. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 4001(9)) Repeals title I of the Internal Security Act of 1950, known as the Subversive Activities Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to protect more fully certain constitutional rights.
